text: On the Open Road is a 1992 play by Steve Tesich. It is a post-apocalyptic tale concerning the events after a "civil war" within the United States. Characters drag wheeled carts filled with meager possessions through a destroyed American wasteland. There have been numerous productions throughout the US.
